Summary: Square shaped craft hovering between 3 towns
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Coats
There were no other sightings in Coats on or around September 29th 2007
divs: sighting detailsi was on my way to a friend's house when about a half of a mile from my house i noticed 2 bright lights in the sky (i was on ebenezer church road when i first spotted it after less than 2 tenths of a mile i turned left onto bailey road which i drove for 2-3 miles before turning right on red hill church) when i drew closer to it i noticed that the 2 lights were one object that was square shaped with 2 bright spot lights (the lights were a combo of white\yellow\orange) pointed at the ground (it was because of these lights i was able to tell it was square shaped) and it appeared to be hovering somewhere between coats, dunn, and erwin, it appeared to be closer to erwin (within 1 or 2 miles of my location). it appeaered to be at tree level altough at that distance it was almost certainly higher (above 500 ft. below 10,000 ft. by my estimate) i had my car windows up because it was cool outside so i couldn't hear if it had any sound. i attempted to follow the object but lost sight of it when i passed though a curvy, swampy area on red hill church road. it was about 2 miles and 5 minutes before i saw the object again it had moved several miles away (exact number of miles unknown but it appeared to be past erwin). i then turned on three bridge road and headed to my friend's house. on my way home before i spotted the object i noticed 3 cars pulled off the road looking in the direction i later saw the object. during the entire time i was on the phone with my mother and father. neither were able to see the object. the weather was clear (no clouds or haze)and the moon was below the trees. the object was on the opposite side of the sky as the moon. i have substantial knowledge about military and civilian aircraft and i know of no aircraft that is square shaped, can hover, and within five minutes fly several miles away. my mother told me previously that she had seen an object matching this description about 2 years ago in the area of the sky around 0530 in the morning. i was excited and felt that i was witnessing something extraordinary thoughout the sighting. i also wished i had grabbed my camera show i could take photos. there were a few other cars on the road at the same time. there were powerlines in the area where i saw at some places but i saw it at locations and distances that didn't have any. there were several aircraft in the area (which isn't unusual since the sighting took place within 10 miles of a regional airport and was in the flightpath of pope afb and rdu international airposrt), when i last saw the craft there was a plane that could have been attempting to chase (or it could have been a star the distance was pretty far and i didn't see it long enough to tell because i turned onto three bridge road altough myt first impression was that it was a plane i don't know if it was civilian or military). i never got to see the full craft but i did see three sides (two sides an the bottom) of it and i could see it was square (mainly because of the bottom).
